basics.name: John Imyeob Kim
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a highly driven software engineer from a program management background. I'm quick to learning new technologies and I do not shy away from new challenges. I believe that my drive and knowledge will be a great addition to the engineering team.

work.summary: I was the primary interface between customers and our engineering team.
highlights: Setup sales team and developed company website

work.summary: I worked as a Frontend Engineer for an iOS app called the Novelist.
highlights: Was featured at Techcrunch Disrupt Hackathon
Worked on development and Marketing for ios app called AT

volunteer.summary: Oragnized meetup events and hosted talks regarding iOS deveopment.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
